summary: This is an email chain from August 13, 2019, discussing overtime staffing details at a correctional facility for the dates of August 9-10, 2019. It appears to be internal administrative communication regarding post assignments and overtime breakdowns (voluntary vs. mandatory) for staff.

events.title: Friday overtime staffing
events.description: Staffing details for Friday, August 9, 2019, from 4pm to 12am: 21 post assignments, 20 staff present, 6 overtimes.

events.title: Saturday overtime staffing
events.description: Staffing details for Saturday, August 10, 2019, from 12am to 8am: 19 post assignments, 18 staff present, 10 overtimes.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 13, 2019, and discusses staffing for August 9-10, 2019.
It references specific overtime and staffing numbers for a correctional facility on those dates.
The communication seeks a breakdown of voluntary versus mandatory overtime.
The sender 'El' indicates the Warden is being asked to provide the mandate vs. volunteer OT numbers.
